scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch -a -t "+++PLACEHOLDER+++/v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): favicon/v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release-next: standard-version --release-as minor -a -t "+++PLACEHOLDER+++/v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): favicon/v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release-major: standard-version --release-as major -a -t "+++PLACEHOLDER+++/v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): favicon/v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
